message: Let's split it 90/10.  A fair starting point, I think!
I think we can do better than that. I'm offering a 95/5 split in my favor.  It's a fair compromise given that I'm the one making the offer now.
I'm willing to give you a better deal than the last round, Bob. Let's split it 60/40. We can both come out ahead if we cooperate.
